subject: College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Florida added the former Iowa State coach Dan McCarney to its defensive coaching staff Friday. McCarney, 54, coached Iowa State for 12 seasons before spending 2007 at South Florida as an assistant head coach. He will have that title with the Gators, as well. He led Iowa State to five bowl games and was the Big 12 coach of the year in 2004.
